mapper.select: SELECT a.person_id as personId, a.name as name, a.surname as surname, a.email as email, a.description as description, a.gender as gender, a.photo as photo, a.cellphone as cellphone FROM person a, manager m WHERE a.person_id = m.person_person_id AND m.username = #{username} AND m.password = #{password} AND a.status = 1
SELECT m.manager_id as managerId, RTRIM(LTRIM( CONCAT(a.name, ' ', a.surname ))) as name, a.photo as userPhoto, a.status as isAvailable FROM person a, manager m WHERE a.person_id = m.person_person_id
